backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping UI changes to affected files and components for several Tambola features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend Tambola-related source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with warm color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the Tambola app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout orchestrating New Game, last number, controls, history panel, number board, and undo button.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: Control panel with Draw Number, Quick Reset, and auto-draw toggle/interval slider with confirmation dialog.
Displays reverse-ordered list of called numbers inside a scrollable card.
Shows the most recently drawn number in a styled circular display or placeholder if none.
New Game button with confirmation dialog triggering a full game reset.
9x10 grid showing numbers 1–90 with styling highlighting called numbers.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, and initializing tambola game state and auto‑draw settings.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for tambola game state, auto‑draw settings, and persisted data.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: React hook managing Tambola game state with draw, undo, reset, auto‑draw, and persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark themes, color variables, and background pattern.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and adding plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Tambola app features, requirements, and architectural notes.
